channel.title: Ghidra on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration

item.title: HTB Challenge: Simple Encryptor Part 1
item.description: Pulling apart a custom simple encryptor from a Hack the Box RE challenge using Ghidra. Part 1 of 2 explores the static analysis process.
